ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 ounce) package Boursin cheese with herbs, room temperature
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic, onion, and peppers, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Let Boursin cheese soften at room temperature for easier spreading over the fish
Drain the canned tomatoes well to prevent the dish from becoming too watery
Arrange fillets in a single layer for even cooking and proper topping distribution
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook create an elegant, flavor-packed dish by managing the herbed cheese topping application and ensuring the fish remains moist and tender.
